titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B161d
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B161d

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

graphic.desc: By kind permission of British Museum

div.tei:ab:
Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.dṯ | | kl | mbny | w-mhlk 2.(ṣ)ntm | | w-b | ḏt | ẓhrn
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[... ... | w-ḥwkm | ḏ-ʾmr | w-šmr | qẓr | qyn | ršw | ʿm | bny | w-sḥ]dṯ | | kl | mbny | w-mhlk 2.[... ... | b-mnšʾ | qtbn | b-ʿṯtr | w-b | ʿm | w-b | ʾnby | w-b | ḏt |] (ṣ)ntm | | w-b | ḏt | ẓhrn

dṯ | | kl | mbny | w-mhlk
ṣntm | | w-b | ḏt | ẓhrn

| w-ḥwkm | ḏ-ʾmr | w-šmr | qẓr | qyn | ršw | ʿm | bny | w-sḥdṯ | | kl | mbny | w-mhlk
| b-mnšʾ | qtbn | b-ʿṯtr | w-b | ʿm | w-b | ʾnby | w-b | ḏt | ṣntm | | w-b | ḏt | ẓhrn

Text preserved in this squeeze:
dṯ kl mbny w-mhlk
ṣntm w-b ḏt ẓhrn
Restored full text of the inscription:
w-ḥwkm ḏ-ʾmr w-šmr qẓr qyn ršw ʿm bny w-sḥdṯ kl mbny w-mhlk
b-mnšʾ qtbn b-ʿṯtr w-b ʿm w-b ʾnby w-b ḏt ṣntm w-b ḏt ẓhrn

Text preserved in this squeeze:
dṯ kl mbny w-mhlk
ṣntm w-b ḏt ẓhrn
Restored full text of the inscription:
w-ḥwkm ḏ-ʾmr w-šmr qẓr qyn ršw ʿm bny w-sḥdṯ kl mbny w-mhlk
b-mnšʾ qtbn b-ʿṯtr w-b ʿm w-b ʾnby w-b ḏt ṣntm w-b ḏt ẓhrn

Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.[...] the entire construction and completion 2.[Dhāt]-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[... ... and Ḥawkam of ʾAmīr and Shammar, the collector and official and high priest of ʿAmm built and esta]blished the entire construction and completion (of) 2.[... ... through the mobilization of the Qatabānians. By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Dhāt]-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.

Text preserved in this squeeze:
... the entire construction and completion
Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.
Restored full text of the inscription:
and Ḥawkam of ʾAmīr and Shammar, the collector and official and high priest of ʿAmm built and established the entire construction and completion of
through the mobilization of the Qatabānians. By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.

Text preserved in this squeeze:
... the entire construction and completion
Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.
Restored full text of the inscription:
and Ḥawkam of ʾAmīr and Shammar, the collector and official and high priest of ʿAmm built and established the entire construction and completion of
through the mobilization of the Qatabānians. By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.

Text preserved in this squeeze:
... the entire construction and completion
Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.
Restored full text of the inscription:
and Ḥawkam of ʾAmīr and Shammar, the collector and official and high priest of ʿAmm built and established the entire construction and completion of
through the mobilization of the Qatabānians. By ʿAthtar and by ʿAmm and by ʾAnbay and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahrān.
